resources.string: We target everyone. Whatever we make, it\'s just for you. Our main focus on our service is your experience. Unlike others, we think everything at your perspective. Mainly makes mobile / web software, often makes some high-quality videos.
Help us fix bugs and problems
Make Tapad available on your language
Sorry, this feature is not available yet.
Thanks! But this feature is not available yet.

Probably the best looking remix app out there. Extended from the instrument LaunchPad, and made mobile friendly with touch gesture support. It mainly features song genres like EDM, Dubstep, Progressive House, Electronic and further more.
Receive updates of a testing version of the app

Last updated: December 14, 2016

You can view the changelog dialog again at any time from the about section.


Version 2.2.1

 1. FIX: App crashing on startup


Version 2.2


1. NEW: Tablet screen size support 
 2. IMPROVEMENT: Ad fallbacks 
 3. FIX: About screen showing wrong presets 
 4. FIX: Status bar disappearing 
 5. FIX: Wrong icons on about screen 


Version 2.2 Beta 1


1. IMPROVEMENT: Duplicated colors show messages 
 2. IMPROVEMENT: Empty ad with no connection 
 3. FIX: Crashing on changing preset fixed 
 4. FIX: Power saving mode glitch fixed 
 5. FIX: Minor bugs fixed 


Version 2.2 Alpha 4


1. FIX: Crashing on devices under KitKat fixed 
 2. FIX: Light issues on looping sound fixed 
 3. FIX: Minor bugs fixed 


Version 2.2 Alpha 3


1. IMPROVEMENT: Tapad images updated 
 2. IMPROVEMENT: Color customization updated 
 3. FIX: Light mode 4 fixed 
 4. FIX: Button getting wrong light effects fixed 
 5. FIX: Minor bugs fixed 


Version 2.2 Alpha 2


1. NEW: Added preset loading status 
 2. NEW: Song details updated 
 3. NEW: Color customization updated 
 4. IMPROVEMENT: Tutorial mode renewed 
 5. IMPROVEMENT: Changelog updated 
 6. IMPROVEMENT: Light mode updated 
 7. IMPROVEMENT: Tutorial updated 
 8. IMPROVEMENT: Feedback UI updated 
 9. IMPROVEMENT: Libraries updated 
 10. FIX: Updated corrupted sound clips 
 11. FIX: Artist details updates 
 12. FIX: Crashing on selecting Tapad / Developer details 


Version 2.2 Alpha 1


1. NEW: Gesture Mode 
 2. NEW: Renewed preset (Alan Walker - Faded) 
 3. NEW: Top User Benefits on first run 
 4. NEW: Dynamic screen size support 
 5. NEW: Square (1:1 ratio) album arts 
 6. NEW: Added preset loading status 
 7. NEW: Artist / song details updated 
 8. IMPROVEMENT: Tutorial mode removed 


Version 2.1


1. NEW: New preset (Alan Walker - Faded) 
 2. IMPROVEMENT: Tutorial mode removed 
 3. FIX: Crashing when selecting decks 
 4. FIX: Wrong links on the artist page 


Version 2.0.1


1. FIX: Crashing at welcome screen on tablets 
 2. FIX: Updated build date 


Version 2.0


1. NEW: Completely renewed UI 
 2. NEW: Tutorial mode 
 3. NEW: Intro slide (first run tutorial) 
 4. NEW: Changelog added 
 5. NEW: Added Quickstart 
 6. NEW: Artist details updated 
 7. IMPROVEMENT: Sound volume increased 
 8. FIX: Sound not playing issue 


Version 1.1.2


1. FIX: UI Crashing 


Version 1.1.1


1. FIX: UI Crashing 


Version 1.1


1. NEW: New preset (The Chainsmokers - Roses) 
 2. FIX: Memory leak issue 


Version 1.0


1. NEW: New preset (OMFG - Hello) 
 2. NEW: Updated UI (4 X 4 layout) 
 3. IMPROVEMENT: Deleted preset (Madeon Adventure) 
 4. FIX: Changed the app icon 
 5. FIX: Changed the app name 


Version 0.1


1. NEW: New app
 2. NEW: New preset (Madeon Adventure)

Stack Overflow

 No description needed. (Developers will know)


Androidhive
 http://www.androidhive.info/
 Helped with a lot of Material Design implementation.


Material Design Guidelines
 https://material.google.com/
 Greatest guideline for a great UX / UI.


Material Design Icons
 https://materialdesignicons.com/
 Tons of beautiful icons following Material Design guideline.


Material Dialogs
 https://github.com/afollestad/material-dialogs/
 Epic library of dialog which now you are watching.


Material Tap Target Prompt
 https://github.com/sjwall/MaterialTapTargetPrompt/
 Saved me from thousands of codes. Beautiful.

Show your love on Tapad on Google Play
Let your friends know this amazing app
The most beautiful remix app, Tapad.
Check out this awesome app! : https://goo.gl/pmws51
Share this awesome app to everyone!

The Chainsmokers have become the hottest young American EDM DJ duo. Their signature sound has its foundations in Indie, Progressive and Pop Music. On the production front, their original tracks have all reached the Beatport top charts and their remixes always hit #1 on the HypeM charts.

Alan Walker (Alan Olav Walker) is a British-Norwegian record producer who was born in Northampton, England. He recorded electronic dance music single \"Faded\" and his song released on NoCopyrightSounds, \"Fade\".
